mapper.select: SELECT r.* FROM tf_sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN tf_sysrole r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tf_sys_user_role ( user_id, role_id ) VALUES (#{userId},#{roleId})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tf_sys_user_role WHERE ( user_id, role_id ) IN ((#{userId},#{roleId}))
